summary: A documentary on speculative fiction writer and essayist Harlan Ellison.
cast: Harlan Ellison|Robin Williams|Neil Gaiman|Edie Adams|Haskell Barkin|Tony Bennett|Stephen Boyd|Michael Cassutt|Peter David|Stu Levin|Ronald D. Moore|Josh Olson|Nicholas Podbrey|Dan Simmons|Tom Snyder|Elke Sommer|Jill St. John|Connie Willis
title: Dreams with Sharp Teeth
